items.title: Bank of America: Pay Attention To What Buffett Does Next
items.description: Warren Buffett has sold approximately $325 billion worth of stock, including Apple and Bank of America. See how investors may want to look at the BAC stock sale.

items.title: GridStor Announces Acquisition of Texas Battery Energy Storage Project From Balanced Rock Power
items.description: PORTLAND, Ore. - GridStor, a developer and operator of utility-scale battery energy storage systems, announced today that it has acquired a 150 MW / 300 MWh battery storage project in Texas from...
